translations.text: Wa-alqi 'asaak; falammmaa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa laa takhaf innee laa yakhaafu ladaiyal mursaloon

translations.text: Wa-adkhil yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'in fee tis'i Aayaatin ilaa Fir'awna Wa-qawmih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

translations.text: Qaala sananzuru asadaqta am kunta minal kaazibeen

translations.text: Qaalat innal mulooka izaa dakhaloo qaryatan afsadoohaa Wa-ja'alooo a'izzata ahlihaaa azillah; Wa-kazaalika yaf'aloon

words.en: But indeed I am||going to send||to them||a gift||and see||with what||return||the messengers

translations.text: Qeela lahad khulis sarha falammaa ra-at-hu hasibat-hu lujjatanw Wa-kashafat 'an saaqaihaa; qaala innahoo sarhum mumarradum min qawaareer; qaalat Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee Wa-aslamtu ma'a Sulaimaana lillaahi Rabbil 'aalameen

words.id: dan pada hari||ditiup||pada/dengan||sangkakala||maka terkejutlah||orang/segala apa||di||langit(jamak)||dan orang/segala apa||di||bumi||kecuali||siapa||menghendaki||Allah||dan masing-masing/semua||mereka datang kepada-Nya||merendahkan diri

words.en: And whoever||comes||with the evil||will be cast down||their faces||in||the Fire||Are||you recompensed||except||(for) what||you used (to)||do

translations.text: Wa-man jaaa'a bissai-yi'ati fakubbat wujoohuhum fin Naari hal tujzawna illaa maa kuntum ta'maloon

words.id: sesungguhnya hanyalah||aku diperintah||untuk||aku menyembah||Tuhan||ini||negeri||yang||Dia menjadikannya suci||dan bagi-Nya||segala||sesuatu||dan aku diperintahkan||supaya||aku adalah||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang berserah diri
words.en: Only||I am commanded||that||I worship||(the) Lord||(of) this||city||the One Who||made it sacred||and to Him (belongs)||all||things||And I am commanded||that||I be||of||the Muslims

translations.text: innamaaa umirtu an a'buda Rabba haazihil baldatil lazee harramahaa Wa-lahoo kullu shai'inw Wa-umirtu an akoona minal muslimeen

words.id: dan supaya||aku membacakan||Al-Qur'an||maka barangsiapa||mendapat petunjuk||maka sesungguhnya||ia mendapat petunjuk||untuk dirinya sendiri||dan barangsiapa||sesat||maka katakanlah||sesungguhnya hanyalah||aku||dari/termasuk||orang-orang yang memberi peringatan
words.en: And that||I recite||the Quran||And whoever||accepts guidance||then only||he accepts guidance||for himself||and whoever||goes astray||then say||Only||I am||of||the warners

translations.text: Wa-an atluwal Qur-aana famanih tadaa fa-innamaa yahtadee linafsihee Wa-man dalla faqul innamaaa ana minal munzireen

words.id: dan katakanlah||segala puji||bagi Allah||Dia akan memperhatikan kepadamu||tanda-tanda-Nya||maka kamu akan mengetahuinya||dan tidaklah||Tuhanmu||dengan lalai||dari/tentang apa||kamu kerjakan
words.en: And say||All praise (be)||to Allah||He will show you||His Signs||and you will recognize them||And your Lord is not||And your Lord is not||unaware||of what||you do

translations.text: Wa-qulil hamdu lillaahi sa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ta'rifoonahaa; Wa-maa Rabbuka bighaafilin 'ammaa ta'maloon
